appDesc.message: Tanaki atu ʻa e Widescreen + Fullscreen ki he ChatGPT ke toe fakalahi atu hono mamataʻi + fakasiʻisiʻi e scroll

menuLabel_fullerWins.message: Ngaahi matapa sioʻata ʻo e kau foo

tooltip_wideScreenOFF.message: Hū ki tuʻa mei he screen fālahí

tooltip_fullWindowON.message: Founga kakato ʻo e matapa sioʻata

tooltip_fullWindowOFF.message: Hu ki tuʻa mei he window kakato

tooltip_fullScreenOFF.message: Hu ki tuʻa mei he screen kakato

helptip_fullerWins.message: Toe fakaʻata foki ʻa e screen falahi ʻi he taimi ʻoku fakaʻata ai ʻa e window kakato

helptip_widerChatbox.message: Fakalahi ʻa e chatbox horizontally ʻi he monitoa falahi

helptip_newChatBtn.message: Fakaʻasi ʻa e chat foʻou ʻi he chatbox

helptip_modeNotifs.message: Fakaʻasi ʻa e fanongonongo ʻi he taimi ʻoku toggling ai ʻa e ngaahi founga/fokotuʻutuʻu

alert_updateAvail.message: ʻOku lava ke maʻu e fakamatala fakamuimuitaha

alert_newerVer.message: Ko ha fakamatala fakamuimuitaha ki he

alert_upToDate.message: ʻO aʻu mai ki he ʻaho ni

alert_isUpToDate.message: ʻOku aʻu ki he ʻaho ni

alert_isOSS.message: Ko e polokalama fakakomipiuta ʻoku fakaava & tauhi ke taʻetotongi ʻi he 100% ngaahi ngaue tokoni

alert_byDonatingResults.message: ʻi hoʻo foaki, ʻoku ke tokoniʻi au ke hokohoko atu ʻeku fakalakalaka, fakaleleiʻi e fanga kiʻi ʻinisekite, tanaki atu ha ngaahi fotunga foʻou, mo ʻai ke toe lelei ange ʻa e polokalama fakakomipiuta

alert_noMatterSize.message: tatau ai pe pe ko e ha hono lahi

alert_directlySupports.message: poupouʻi fakahangatonu ʻeku ngaahi ngaue taʻe totongi ke fakapapauʻi ʻoku kei tauʻataina pe ʻa e ngaue ni pea ʻata ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻe he taha kotoa

alert_growTogether.message: Te tau lava fakataha ʻo tauhi ʻa e polokalama fakakomipiuta malohi ko ʻeni ke tupulaki

alert_pressF11.message: Lomiʻi ʻa e K11 ke hu ki tuʻa mei he screen kakato

alert_f11reason.message: Naʻe fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e K11 ke fakahu kakato ʻa e screen, pea koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi ʻuhinga maluʻi ʻo e browser, kuo pau ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e ki tatau ke hu ki tuʻa mei ai
